articles.title: Instagram Launches 'Channels' Broadcast Chat Feature - Social Media Today
articles.description: Channels will enable creators and brands to share DM updates with fans.
articles.content: Instagram is rolling out a new feature called Instagram Channels, which is essentially a group messaging function within the app where you can stay up to date on specific topics, brands, people, etc.… [+1566 chars]
